Title: Relates to establishing the COVID-19 recovery local employment tax credit program
Summary: Establishes the COVID-19 recovery local employment tax credit program to provide tax incentives to employers for employing local employees in full-time or part-time positions in the two years following the conclusion of the state disaster emergency declared pursuant to executive order two hundred two.
LawCode: Add §25-d, Lab L; amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law and the tax law, in relation to establishing the COVID-19 recovery local employment tax credit program
